title: WAREHOUSE_EVENTS_HISTORY view: New columns in output (Pending) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_08 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the Account Usage
WAREHOUSE_EVENTS_HISTORY view includes the following new column:
WAREHOUSE_TYPE and RESOURCE_CONSTRAINT are only populated for EVENTNAME=WAREHOUSE_CONSISTENT events, otherwise NULL is displayed.
